cz.muni.fi.xstupka.rwtester.graph
Interface Graph

All Known Implementing Classes:
GraphImpl
public interface Graph

This interface describes a graph. Almost all classes of this package use only this intarface for processing graphs.

Method Summary
 int getNumberOfEdges()
          Returns number of edges.
 int getNumberOfVertices()
          Returns number of vertices.
 Vertex getVertex(java.lang.String name)
          Returns appropriate vertex.
 java.util.Collection<Vertex> getVertices()
          Returns all vertices of the graph.
 boolean isDirected()
          Returns information whether the graph is directed or not.
 boolean isWeighted()
          Returns information whether the graph is weighted or not.
 

Method Detail

isDirected

boolean isDirected()
Returns information whether the graph is directed or not.

Returns:
true if the graph is directed, false otherwise

Returns information whether the graph is weighted or not.

Returns:
